channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwanese High School Student Creates Earthquake Alert Mobile App
item.description: A Taiwanese highschooler has designed a mobile alert app that notifies users of impending earthquakes, helping people prepare for potential disasters. The app has caught on in Taiw

item.title: Taiwan, California Sign MOU on Drone Research Cooperation
item.description: Drone centers in California and the southern Taiwanese city of Chiayi have signed an MOU aimed at cooperation on research and expanding market access.

item.title: Yilan Fire Dept. Deploys Robot To Fight Warehouse Blaze
item.description: A fire department in Eastern Taiwan has deployed the country's first remote-controlled firefighting robot, one of a fleet it plans to roll out throughout this year. Officials hope

item.title: Traps, Pesticides Threatened Ring-Necked Pheasant in Southern Taiwan
item.description: Ring-necked pheasants are under threat from pesticides and traps laid by farmers in southern Taiwan.
